reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's fit, noting it rests perfectly at the waist and is flattering without being tight or see-through. Customers appreciate its length, with one noting it hits just right at the waist, and its style, with one describing it as chic and another noting it doesn't look sloppy or boxy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater for fall and winter
items.body: I’m really happy with this sweater. The fit is flattering without being tight, and the cropped length hits just right at the waist — perfect with high-waisted jeans or trousers for a polished but easy look. The material is soft and lightweight, making it ideal for fall weather or layering under a blazer for work. What I love: • The fabric feels breathable and not bulky — great for a business casual outfit. • The neckline and sleeves keep their shape after washing (I laid it flat to dry). • It drapes nicely without clinging, so it’s comfortable all day. • The colors look true to the pictures online — very wearable tones for the season. A few notes: • It’s a lightweight sweater, so don’t expect thick or fuzzy knit — it’s more of a refined, transitional piece. • If you’re between sizes, you could size up for a slightly relaxed fit. Overall, it’s a well-made, stylish piece that looks much more expensive than it is. I’ve already worn it to work and on the weekend — definitely a great addition to my fall wardrobe! Read more
items.author: WendyBG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fitting and stylish details!
items.body: I’m really impressed with this sweater and tbh I didn’t have high expectations. The material is soft, warm, and not itchy at all. I’m 5’7” slender. Paired great with high waisted wide leg jeans for church. I’ll update again after washing. Hoping no pilling. Then I will watch for discounted pricing on other colors- so many to choose from. Read more
items.author: Elaine James

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing top!
items.body: The cutest top! The material is light weight and the style is super cute, especially with the current higher waist jeans/pants these days. The top is the perfect length of crop. I can easily wear the top under a vest or jacket without feeling too warm. I am right under 5'5" and 139 lbs. The size small fit me perfect! Also, I do have a long torso, but the top still fit great with my "mom jeans!" I just ordered the almond color top, same size. Read more
items.author: Jana Sharp

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only good for high waisted pants
items.body: Comfortable and stylish. It's not a warm sweater but that's not why I returned it. I am returning it bc it only looks good with high waisted (mom jeans) pants. If you wear them with normal jeans that goes slightly below your bellybutton then the sweater makes your torso look short. Giving 4 stars bc it is a nice sweater and if I only wore high waisted/mom jeans it would be great but I don't. The color also came more brown but a nice brown.... similar color to a brown bear. Read more
items.author: Ron Krouse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect length for me
items.body: Nice quality and fit. Very soft. Will update after first washing. I an 5’7”, 134 lbs, 38 D chest and 29” waist. I wear a sports bra underneath, so that squishes my normal D cups down to B-C. The fit is nice and I wore it with medium rise jeans. The sweater covered the top of the jeans where a belt would go, so it is the perfect length for me (I am a bit short-waisted with long legs). If you are longer in the waist, this may be more of a crop top on you. For my body, it is not cropped, but the perfect length. I will buy more after I see how this washes. Read more
items.author: PupLover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall sweater
items.body: Loved the color, fabric, and fit. I’m 5’7”, and the sleeves were a great length and it hit below my waistline, at my hips, which is the fit I wanted. Read more
items.author: PagosaDoc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it. You need it. Your closet needs it.
items.body: Since return to office, I’ve been on the hunt for cute, comfy basics for work. You know the kind of shirt or sweater you want to throw on and not think about and all you need is some jewelry to jazz it up and your only concern is if you should wear black or navy trousers? This is it. I’m on my first wear of this, but it’s a dream. It’s soft. It’s warm. I can EASILY pair this sweater with a cute jacket or layer a button up under or over depending on what look I’m going for. Unsure of how it’s going to wear after washing. And while I was typing that out I just realized I should probably NOT buy every single color of this sweater I just added to cart until it’s been washed a few times. I do plan on hanging up to dry though. I’m unsure if I can trust my dryer not to shrink it. This is not a heavy, wool sweater. It doesn’t feel like that gross, synthetic material we’re used to with some Amazon purchases…you know what I’m talking about. This feels more like I bought a knock off cashmere sweater at a cute, midwestern pharmacy and gift shop downtown that has a small hallmark collectibles section and Fannie May chocolates…IFYKYK. A medium fits well; hits right at the waist, but I’m not worried about lifting my arms and it suddenly becoming a crop top. I’m 5’2 for reference and I guess you could say chesty for my short stature. Normally, I wear a medium and don’t worry about that medium not fitting, if that makes sense! I’d post a picture, but I made the mistake of ordering the white and it’s really accentuating my need for a tan. Read more
items.author: ah2485

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Comfy. Love the color, fit and so soft but it pills. Was a little disappointed in that but I did order another color. So can’t be that disappointed. Read more
items.author: Love to buy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Deep Coffee, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Brick Red, Light Almond, Light Blue, White, Deep Blue, Forest Deep Green, Deep Purple, Coral Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
